description: This file defines the interface 'IButler' within the WPEFramework project, including nested notification interface and methods for managing value points and their metadata.

classes.name: IButler
classes.description: Interface for managing value points, notifications, and metadata synchronization within the WPEFramework.

classes.name: INotification
classes.description: Nested interface for receiving notifications about added, removed, updated, or metadata-changed value points in the IButler.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a sink for receiving notifications about value point changes.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered notification sink.

methods.name: Element (by name)
methods.description: Retrieves a value point identified by its name.

methods.name: Element (by id)
methods.description: Retrieves a value point identified by its numeric ID.

methods.name: Source
methods.description: Returns the source string associated with a specific module.

methods.name: Branch
methods.description: Creates or retrieves a branch at the specified path.

methods.name: Link
methods.description: Links a path to an element ID.

methods.name: Move
methods.description: Moves or renames a value point to a new name within a path.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes a value point or branch at the specified path.

methods.name: Orphans
methods.description: Retrieves an iterator over orphaned value points for a given module.

calls: Access to value points via name or ID

ctags.name: IButler
ctags.pattern: /^		struct EXTERNAL IButler : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^			struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
